channel.title: Bvlgari BV2119B – Women’s Designer Glasses
channel.description: Bvlgari was started by Sotirios Voulgaris, a jeweller from Epirus, Greece. In Italian, his name is Sotirio Bulgari. He started his first jewellery store in his hometown. In 1877, he left to travel to Corfu and then Naples, finally settling down in Rome in 1884. This is where Bulgari opened his second store and founded [...]
